sentences.english: There was no territorial incursion, the ministry said.
sentences.chinese: 沒有入侵領土，防衛省說道。

sentences.english: Most cases detected in other provinces have been linked directly to the outbreak in Uige.
sentences.chinese: 在其它省發現的大多數病例與威熱的暴發直接有關。

sentences.english: In Pas-de-Calais the French lifestyle is better.
sentences.chinese: 加萊海峽省的法式生活才更逍遙。

sentences.english: Saved the meteorological observatory evening to issue the Zhejiang coastal area strong typhoon urgent alarm yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 省氣象臺昨天傍晚發佈浙江沿海地區強颱風緊急警報。

sentences.english: Was it ignorance by provincial authorities or was it that they neglected to report it?
sentences.chinese: 是省當局的無知還是漏報？

sentences.english: Japan's parliament has passed legislation to upgrade the country's defense agency into a full ministry.
sentences.chinese: 日本國會通過議案，將日本防衛廳升級爲省。

sentences.english: This event had at last been despaired of, but it was then too late to be saving.
sentences.chinese: 這個指望落了空，如今省喫儉用已經太遲了。

sentences.english: Owais Ghani is the top administrator of Pakistan's tribal regions as the governor of the North West Frontier Province.
sentences.chinese: 加尼是巴基斯坦西北邊境省省長。

sentences.english: Will you draw us an outline map of your province?
sentences.chinese: 你給我們畫張你們省的草圖好嗎？

sentences.english: At least two women must be elected from each province.
sentences.chinese: 每個省必須選出兩名女性議員。

sentences.english: His 14-year-old sister, also from Thai Binh Province.
sentences.chinese: 他的14歲妹妹，也來自太平省。

sentences.english: Which provinces are joined to New Brunswick by land?
sentences.chinese: 哪些省與新布倫斯維克省接壤？

sentences.english: The student announces the work rather plentiful, the play broadcasts in the province television station.
sentences.chinese: 學生髮表作品頗豐，編導的課本劇在省電視臺播放。

sentences.english: Then the rate hike on second-hand housing market in our province the true impact of what?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，加息對二手房市場在我們省的真正影響是什麼？

sentences.english: Then the king promoted Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego, in the province of Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 那時王在巴比倫省，高升了沙得拉，米煞，亞伯尼歌。

sentences.english: By various sacrifices his parents sent him through middle school.
sentences.chinese: 父母省喫撿用，供他上完中學。
